```{r setup}
library(chk)
library(microbenchmark)
```

```{r}
fun_chk <- function(x, chk = TRUE) {
  if(isTRUE(chk)) chk_flag(x)
  x
}

fun_chk2 <- function(x) fun_chk(x, chk = FALSE)

fun_option <- function(x) {
  if(isTRUE(getOption("chk.chk", TRUE))) chk_flag(x)
  x
}

fun_option2 <- function(x) {
  chk.chk <- options(chk.chk = FALSE)
  on.exit(options(chk.chk))
  fun_option(x)
}

microbenchmark(
  fun_chk2(1),
  fun_chk2(TRUE),
  fun_option2(1),
  fun_option2(TRUE)
)
```
